left_section.title: THE FOUNDATION
left_section.content: The UCSF Foundation serves as the giving, receiving, and investing arm of the greater UCSF community and is operated by the Office of Development and Alumni Relations.

right_section.title: THE FOUNDATION
right_section.description: The UCSF Foundation serves as the giving, receiving, and investing arm of the greater UCSF community and is operated by the Office of Development and Alumni Relations.

alert.text: It’s Giving Tuesday! Click here to make your gift now.

hero_content.heading: Your giving inspires a world of good health.

full.heading: Give Where it’s Needed Most
full.body: Everyday, UCSF faces big challenges. Your gifts make it possible for us to act quickly or conduct research and nimbly develop innovative science. From responding to disease outbreaks to exploring a cure for cancer, give a gift where it is needed today.

first.title: Bluestone to Head Parker Cancer Immunotherapy Institute
first.copy_text: The Parker Foundation with a $250 million grant has launched the Parker Institute for Cancer Immunotherapy.

second.title: Bluestone to Head Parker Cancer Immunotherapy Institute
second.copy_text: The Parker Foundation with a $250 million grant has launched the Parker Institute for Cancer Immunotherapy.

third.title: Bluestone to Head Parker Cancer Immunotherapy Institute
third.copy_text: The Parker Foundation with a $250 million grant has launched the Parker Institute for Cancer Immunotherapy.

start_fundraiser.title: Make a Difference Where it Matters.
start_fundraiser.body_text: Start your own fundraiser and share why UCSF is important to you. Our online platform makes it easy to make a difference.

give_to.title: Your giving is the foundation for our greatest innovations in research, education, and patient care.
give_to.body_text: Give a gift directly where it is needed the most.

give_to_full: Your support is the foundation for our greatest innovations in research, education, and patient care.

content.label: Give Where it’s Needed Most
content.body: Everyday, UCSF faces big challenges. Your gifts make it possible for us to act quickly or conduct research and nimbly develop innovative science. From responding to disease outbreaks to exploring a cure for cancer, give a gift where it is needed today.
